message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price.  I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.  Let's make this deal happen!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $8,200 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
